Line3.1257C2: He’s so scared, Ma, I can’t let him face it alone... Whatever happens, I hope you’ll understand.  - your Deirdre
Line1.1257C2: Ma... Faolan has been cursed. I’ve tried every charm and druid’s trick I can think of, but today, I had to chain him to the floor. He’ll soon become a beast, same as the others.
